alert.note: Alert for Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 23 at 10:00AM CST until January 25 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River near White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier ...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Louisiana... West Fork of The Calcasieu River At Sam Houston Jones SP Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Calcasieu River Near Salt Water Barrier. * WHEN...Until late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 4.0 feet, Minor marshland flooding occurs. Flooding also begins on River Road in north Lake Charles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:00 AM CST Monday the stage was 2.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will oscillate around flood stage with a maximum value of 4.2 feet early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 4.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (12 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Calcasieu River Salt Water Barrie 4.0 2.9 Mon 5 am CST 4.2 3.3 3.2 &&
